      • addCustomMsgType

        public void addCustomMsgType(int viewType,
                             CustomMsgConfig bean)
        Specify custom message config, include view type, layout resource id, is send outgoing(according to layout) and custom view holder's Class object.
        Parameters:
        viewType - View type, must not set 0-12, otherwise will throw IllegalArgumentException
        bean - CustomMsgConfig

        public void addToStart(MESSAGE message,
                       boolean scrollToBottom)
        Add message to bottom of list
        Parameters:
        message - message to be add
        scrollToBottom - if true scroll list to bottom

      • addToEnd

        public void addToEnd(java.util.List<MESSAGE> messages)
        Add messages to end, the messages in list are in descending order. For example: messages[0].timeString > messages[1].timeString. To load last page of messages from history, use this method.
        Parameters:
        messages - Last page of messages.

      • addToEndChronologically

        public void addToEndChronologically(java.util.List<MESSAGE> messages)
        If messages in list is sorted chronologically, for example, messages[0].timeString < messages[1].timeString. To load last page of messages from history, use this method.
        Parameters:
        messages - Last page of messages.

      • getMessageList

        public java.util.List<MESSAGE> getMessageList()

        public void updateMessage(MESSAGE message)
        Update message by its id.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be updated.

        public void updateMessage(java.lang.String oldId,
                          MESSAGE newMessage)
        Updates message by old identifier.
        Parameters:
        oldId - message id to be updated
        newMessage - message to be updated

      • updateOrAddMessage

        public void updateOrAddMessage(java.lang.String oldId,
                               MESSAGE newMessage,
                               boolean scrollToBottom)
        Updates message or add message if oldId not exist.
        Parameters:
        oldId - message id to be updated
        newMessage - message to be updated
        scrollToBottom - scroll to bottom flag
